snippet: Fresh bloodshed in a remote region of western China underscored tensions over Chinese rule in ethnic minority areas days before an important policy meeting in Beijing.
abstract: Fresh bloodshed in a remote region of western China underscores tensions over Chinese rule in ethnic minority areas days before an important policy meeting in Beijing; the tensions have been growing in ethnic Uighur and Tibetan areas, and violence involving security forces and civilians is becoming a regular occurrence.
lead_paragraph: Fresh bloodshed in a remote region of western China underscored tensions over Chinese rule in ethnic minority areas days before an important policy meeting in Beijing.

headline.seo: Violence in Western China Leaves 20 Dead
headline.main: Deadly Clashes Erupt in Western China
headline.print_headline: Deadly Clashes Erupt in Western China
